description: This file defines the root layout component for a Next.js frontend application. It includes metadata configuration, a sidebar navigation menu, and layout structure to render routed pages, with UI components for navigation and layout styling.

methods.name: NavLink
methods.description: A React component that renders a styled navigation link using Next.js Link component.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: The main React component for the application's layout, rendering the sidebar, header, and main content area.
